text:
Ronalee Chapchuk "Rona" Ambrose (; born March 15, 1969) is a Canadian politician. He was interim Leader of the Conservative Party and the Leader of the Opposition between 2015 and 2017.
She was the Conservative Party member of the House of Commons for Sturgeon River—Parkland between 2015 and 2017, and had represented Edmonton—Spruce Grove from 2004 to 2015.
